titles.title: Cable Rate Disclosure Act of 1989
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the limitation on the use of losses from nonlife insurance companies against the income of life insurance companies.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/3/1987--Introduced. Repeals provisions of the Internal Revenue Code which limit the use of certain losses from non-life insurance companies against the consolidated taxable income of an affiliated group which includes one or more domestic insurance companies.
